title: Moregine
description: Moregine, immediately to the south of the archaeological site of Pompeii, is the findspot of an important archaeological assemblage buried by seismic activity that preceded that final eruption of Vesuvius in A.D. 79.

properties.description: Pointed location of modern hamlet of Moregine based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap. Archaeological excavations in this area have revealed pre-79 A.D. remains.
properties.title: OSM location of modern hamlet of Moregine
